Verses: 1 dhevane, Neer Ennudaiya Dhevan; Adhigaalame Ummaith Thedugiren; Varandadhum Vidaaiththadhum Thanneeratradhumaana Nilaththile En Aaththumaa Ummel Thaagamaayirukkiradhu, En Maamsamaanadhu Ummai Vaanjikkiradhu.
2 ippadiye Parisuththa Sthalaththil Ummaippaarkka Aasaiyaayirundhu, Umadhu Vallamaiyaiyum Umadhu Magimaiyaiyum Kanden.
3 jeevanaippaarkkilum Umadhu Kirubai Nalladhu; En Udhadugal Ummaith Thudhikkum.
4 en Jeevanullamattum Naan Ummaith Thudhiththu, Umadhu Naamaththaich Sollik Kaiyeduppen.
5 ninaththaiyum Kozhuppaiyum Undadhupola En Aaththumaa Thirupthiyaagum; En Vaai Aanandhakkalippulla Udhadugalaal Ummaip Potrum.
6 en Padukkaiyinmel Naan Ummai Ninaikkumbodhu, Raachsaamangalil Ummaith Dhiyaanikkiren.
7 neer Enakkuth Thunaiyaayirundhadhinaal, Umadhu Settaigalin Nizhalile Kalikoorugiren.
8 en Aaththumaa Ummaith Thodarndhu Patrikkondirukkiradhu; Umadhu Valadhukaram Ennaith Thaangugiradhu.
9 en Piraananai Azhikkath Thedugiravargalo, Boomiyin Thaazhvidangalil Iranguvaargal.
11 raajaavo Dhevanil Kalikooruvaar; Avarperil Saththiyampannugiravargal Yaavarum Menmaipaaraattuvaargal; Poi Pesugiravargalin Vaai Adaikkappadum.
